entry.title: Russia's Black Sea Flagship Sinks After Ukraine Claims Missile Strike
entry.content: The warship Moskva sank from damage suffered from a fire onboard following what the Ukrainian military said was a cruise missile attack targeting the vessel.

entry.title: Anti-Russia Alliance Is Missing a Big Bloc: The Developing World
entry.content: Nations are resisting economic sanctions and voicing criticism over the Ukraine invasion, fearful of political and economic repercussions from Moscow or Beijing. “Our position is not that this is not our problem.”
